snippet: Much of the violence was concentrated in mainly Shiite provinces in southern Iraq, including four bombings in Kut Province that killed 15 people.
abstract: Bombing attacks kill at least 34 people across Iraq, mainly in southern Shiite provinces.
lead_paragraph: Much of the violence was concentrated in mainly Shiite provinces in southern Iraq, including four bombings in Kut Province that killed 15 people.

headline.main: Bombings Kill at Least 34 in Iraq, Mostly in Southern Provinces and Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Bombings Kill at Least 34 in Iraq, Mostly in Southern Provinces and Baghdad
